title: Report on Order Fill Rate
description: A manager wants to analyze the order fill rate (the percentage of orders shipped complete without backorders) for the previous month.

tasks.description: Generate a report of all orders shipped in the previous month.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully retrieves a list of last month's orders.

tasks.description: Analyze the data to count the total number of orders and the number of orders that were shipped complete (no splits or backorders).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly counts the total and complete orders.
The fill rate is calculated to be 97%.

tasks.description: Update the monthly operations dashboard with the new fill rate metric.
tasks.expected_outcome: The dashboard is updated with the latest performance data.
